biggest-cities.name: Biggest City
biggest-cities.description: List of 40 biggest cities of the world: PARIS, KOBE OSAKA, SEOUL, HOUSTON, BARCELONA, PHILADELPHIA, SANTIAGO, LAGOS, DALLAS, NEW YORK, ISTANBUL, TOKYO, FUKUOKA, LONDON, KUALA LUMPUR, LIMA, HO CHI MINH CITY, MANILA, GUADALAJARA, MADRID, NAGOYA, SINGAPORE, JOHANNESBURG, BELO HORIZONTE, TORONTO, MEXICO CITY, MIAMI, ATLANTA, RIO DE JANEIRO, BUENOS AIRES, SAO PAULO, CHICAGO,…

small-powerful.name: Small But Powerful
small-powerful.description: This map is designed to add variety to the game of Geoguess by leaving out large nations. Australia, Brasil, Canada, China, Russia and United States of America are not included.

urban.name: Urban World
urban.description: Area of dense human habitation. Derived from 2002-2003 MODIS satellite data.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: 2 complex cities 😵 : Santa Cruz de la Sierre (Bolivia) & Touba (Senegal)

french-stations.name: French stations 🇫🇷
french-stations.description: The list of French passenger stations

big-airports.name: Big airports ✈️
big-airports.description: This map contains the largest airports (> 600) on the world.

german-football-stadiums.name: German football stadiums ⚽
german-football-stadiums.description: German football stadiums of clubs in the first (Bundesliga) to fourth (Regionalliga) leagues

nordic-vibes.name: Nordic vibes
nordic-vibes.description: Walk in the Nordic countries (Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Faroe Islands, Iceland)
